column4: yeah,google pretty much turns up people asking the same question
Scripted:hmm i have a xtream music,how about you?

with 9.10 it saw my soundcard from the start but when I play any sound,music regardless of source i get a staticy distortion and echo effects.What did you do exactly to get the creative drivers to work,Sudo make then sudo make install right?I get errors on everything when i do that.i have tried turning the mode "off" in sound in preferences
Mine worked from install. I'm using ALSA
